title: Splice-Junction Gene Sequences
description: The problem posed in this dataset is to recognize, given a sequence of DNA, the boundaries between exons (the parts of the DNA sequence retained after splicing) and introns (the parts of the DNA sequence that are spliced out).

target.name: Class
target.description: Target class: one of {n ei ie}. 'EI' is exon/intron boundary; 'IE' is intro/exon boundary; and 'N' is neither

features.description: base type in position -30 in sequence
